172b2(rgyud 'grel): par bsgrub par bya'o/ /mnyam pa de nyid de las gnas pas na de'i phyir mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can mnyam pa nyid dang/ sems mnyam pa nyid dang/ bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ sbyong ba
172b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid dang/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o//
172b4(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /byang chub gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms
172b5(rgyud 'grel): par zhugs las na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub gang dang mnyam pa stong pa nyid gang de dang mnyam mo/ /stong pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa
172b6(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /stong pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa mtshan ma med pa yang de dang mnyam mo/ /mtshan ma med pa gang dang mnyam pa sems
172b7(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa gang dag mnyam 
173a1(rgyud 'grel): pa smon pa med pa'ang de dang mnyam mo/ /smon pa med pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /mnyam pa nyid
173a2(rgyud 'grel): de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms pa zhes bya'o/ /smon pa med pa gang dang mnyam pa mngon par 'du mi byed pa'ang de dang mnyam mo/ /mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /sems
173a3(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang dang mnyam pa mi skye ba yang de dang mnyam mo/
173a4(rgyud 'grel): mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa
173a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa mi 'byung ba yang de dang mnyam mo/ /mi 'byung ba gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam
173a6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /mi 'byung ba gang dang mnyam pa dngos po med pa yang de dang mnyam mo/ /dngos po med pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /sems
173a7(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /dngos po med pa gang dang mnyam pa rnam par dag pa yang de dang mnyam mo/ /
173b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /
173b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sems mnyam pas sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid de/ de la zhugs pas na de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /de lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pas na/ bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems
173b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i sa mngon du gyur pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag par spyod pa yin la/ de'i bdag nyid can yin pas na/ shes rab chen po lus 'chad pa zhes bya ste/ shes rab nyid lus yin la de'i bdag nyid kyis 'dzin par mdzad pas na shes rab
173b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po lus 'chang ba'o/ /de yang shes rab de'i rnam pa ni ji lta bu/ 'jug pa ni ci zhe na/ thos pa ni rnam pa'o/ /tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'jug pa'o/ /thos pa yang rnam pa ni ji lta bu/ 'jug pa ni ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos
173b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam pa ni brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i rnam pa dang/ bsam pa'i rnam pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rnam pa dang/ sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang/ nga rgyal med pa'i rnam pa dang/ bag yod pa'i rnam
173b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ gus par byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ mthun par 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang/ dka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ rna ba brags te nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ yid la byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i rnam pa dang/ gnas
173b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnam pa dang/ chos la rin po cher 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang/ sman du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang/ rtags pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang/ blo gros 'dod pa'i rnam
174a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ blo la 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi ngoms par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ gtong ba spel ba'i rnam pa dang/ dul zhing cang shes pa'i rnam pa dang/ mang du thos pa la brten pa'i rnam pa dang/ bsti
174a2(rgyud 'grel): stang du byas te dga' ba myong bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ lus bde ba'i rnam pa dang/ sems rab tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang/ mi skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ don nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ tshes nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ nan tan nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ gzhan
174a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi bstan pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ chos ma zos pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ mngon par shes pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i sde snod nyan pa'i
174a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ dran pa dang/ shes bzhin nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ skye ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pa dang/ mi skye ba la mkhas
174a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam pa dang/ mi sdug pa'i rnam pa dang/ byams pa'i rnam pa dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rnam pa dang/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal pa'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang/
174a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam pa dang/ chung mi gzon pa'i rnam pa dang/ rang gi kha na las pa'i rnam
174a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rang gi sems bsrung ba'i rnam pa dang/ brtson 'grus mi gtongs pa'i rnam pa dang/ chos la nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i rnam pa dang/ rang gi phyogs bsrung ba'i rnam pa dang/ pha rol gyi phyogs dang/ nyon mongs pa
174b1(rgyud 'grel): tshang gcod pa'i rnam pa yang/ nor bdun yang dag par 'du ba'i rnam pa dang/ dbul ba thams cad gcod pa'i rnam pa dang/ 'dzangs pas bsngags pa'i rnam pa dang/ mkhas pa mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang/ /? ? kun shes pa'i rnam pa dang/
174b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa ma yin pa dad par byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ bden pa mthong ba'i rnam pa dang/ phung po'i skyon rnam par spangs pa'i rnam pa dang/ 'dus byas kyi skyon la yongs su 'jal ba'i rnam pa dang/ don la rton pa'i rnam pa dang/ chos la rton pa'i rnam pa dang/ ye
174b3(rgyud 'grel): shes la rton pa'i rnam pa dang/ nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i rnam pa dang/ legs par bya ba'i las kyi rnam pa dang/ mi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa dang/ khyad par du 'gro
174b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rnam pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa sha ra dwA ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la 'jug pa ni
174b5(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang/ lhag mthong rnam par dpyad pa'i 'jug pa dang/ sems las su rung ba la 'jug pa dang/ lus dben pa la 'jug pa dang/ sems dben pa la 'jug pa
174b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang/ bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa la 'jug pa dang/ chad pa med pa la 'jug pa dang/ rtag pa med pa la 'jug pa dang/ rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa dang/ bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang srog med pa dang gang zag
174b7(rgyud 'grel): med la 'jug pa dang/ 'od pa dang 'gro ba dang gnas pa med pa la 'jug pa dang/ mi 'pho zhing rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba la 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'dris par byed pa la 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
175a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang smon pa med pa mngon sum du mi byed pa la 'jug pa dang/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i tshul la 'jug pa dang/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang
175a2(rgyud 'grel): gis mi skye ba la 'jug pa dang/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes bskyed pa la 'jug pa dang/ zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang/ nang du rtog pa la 'jug pa dang/ nges par gyur par mi 'jug pa 'jug pa dang/ 'dus
175a3(rgyud 'grel): byas kyi skyon yongs su 'jal ba la 'jug pa dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon sum du mi byed par 'jug pa dang/ sems can thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa la 'jug pa dang/ snying rje chen po mi gtong ba la 'jug pa dang/ skye ba thams cad la
175a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par blta ba la 'jug pa dang/ rtag tu bsams bzhin du shes pas srid pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'jug pa dang/ yid 'byung zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi mngon sum du mi byed pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i yon tan yal
175a5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dor ba la 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi dga' ba mi gtong ba la 'jug pa dang/ spros pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong ba la 'jug pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa'i spros pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa mi spong par 'jug ste/ btsun pa sha radwA ti'i bu de dag ni
175a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la 'jug pa sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa sha radwA ti'i bu gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba de ni rigs pa'i tshig go /de ni tshul gyi tshig go /de ni sgo'i tshig go /de ni kha'i tshig go /
175a7(rgyud 'grel): de ni rgyu'i tshig go /de ni rkyen gyi tshig go /de ni mi 'gog pa'i tshig go /de ni mi 'gal ba'i tshig go zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du ji srid du chos thams cad rigs pas ji ltar gnas pa bzhin mthong na de ltar mthong ba ni tshul bzhin mthong ba'o/ /'khor ba'i
175b1(rgyud 'grel): khams kyi tshul bzhin gang yin pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshul yang de yin no/ /zhes gang gis de ltar mtshungs shing bye brag med par mthong ba de ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gang de ltar chos kyi rnam pa
175b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ thos pa'i rnam pa dang/ tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyong ba'i rgyu mthun pa de ni shes rab ces bya'o/ /de ltar de lta bu'i rnam pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab ste/ de gnyi ga'i ngo bo nyid 'dzin par mdzad pas na/ shes rab chen po/
175b3(rgyud 'grel): lus 'chang ba zhes bya ste/ dpal ldan rdo rje snying po'i rgyan las kyang/ bde gshegs dri med shes rab ni/ /rdo rje rnon por de bshad do zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sa ring du song ba la ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag par
175b4(rgyud 'grel): spyad pas na thabs chen te/ thabs kyi sgra 'dis ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' i thabs sgrub pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag kyang mi dmigs la rtag tu bdag nyid kyis sped pa yang spyod do/ /sems
175b5(rgyud 'grel): can yang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i brtson pa yang spyod do/ /nyon mongs pa yang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu dbang po rnams sped pa la yang spyod do/ /de la gang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs ma yin pa'i gzugs ma yin pa'i
175b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa yang yin/ de la gang chos kyi sgra ma yin pa'i sgra gang yang grags par mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu chos nyan pas ngoms mi myong ba yang yin no/ /'khor ba yang mi
175b7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa rtag tu 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa yang yin no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ /mya ngan las 'das pa khong du chud par bya ba'i khyer bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtod par yang byed do/ /sangs
176a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub kyang mi dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam brgya stong mang po yang mngon par sgrub ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i ? sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan gyi don
176a2(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug pa thams cad ni thabs kyi nang du 'dus pa'o/ /de lta bu'i thabs chen po dang ldan pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs so// //byang chub sems dpa' i sa mi g.yo ba la ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par smin pa'i tshul du
176a3(rgyud 'grel): lhag par spyod cing smon lam chen po mnga' pas smon lam chen po ste/ chen po'i sgra ni thabs bzhin du 'di la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la smon lam yang 'jam dpal gyi zhing gi bkod pa las sngon bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs 'khor los sgyur
176a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i sbyin sngar smon lam tshad med pa btab pa lta bu ste/ de yang de nas rgyal po nam mkha' srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus
176a5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'bru sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po gal ba der dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas
176a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ /rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/
176a7(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi zhal sngar chos dam zhu/ /skyes bu'i dam pa mchog skye bar/ /rnam pa gang gi 'gyur ba de/ /rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs/ /rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum du/ /mchod pa yangs pa bgyid bgyid kyang/ /ma ngas sems kyis bgyid
176b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur gyis/ /gang yang yongs su bsdom bgyis/ /bdag ni gcig tu dben gnas tshe/ /'di 'dra'i sems zhig skyes par 'gyur/ /bdag gis bsod nams che bsags na/ /ji ltar yongs su de bsngo snyam/ /tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin rnam /gling
176b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dbang phyug thob pa 'am/ /'on te nyan thos dngos por 'am/ /rang rgyal thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam/ /de ltar sems bskyed de ma thag /lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni/ /dam pa'i sems kyi bsod nams 'di/ /rnam par chud gson ma byed cig /sems
176b3(rgyud 'grel): can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis/ /byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing/ /'jig rten rnams kyi don yang gyis/ /de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhu ste/ thub pa ji ltar sems
176b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed na/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur/ /ye shes de ni gang gis 'thob/ /de don bdag la bstan du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyis shing/ /thub pa khyod 'drar bdag kyang smon/ /de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas/ /de bzhin
176b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pas bka' stsal ba/ /rgyal po chen pos shes par gyis/ /rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad rkyen bzhin te/ /'dun pa'i rtse la rab tu gnas/ /gang gis smon lam ci btab pa/ /de yi 'bras bu thob par
176b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /rgyal po ngas kyang sngon chad ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /ngas ni smon lam dam pa btab/ /smon lam ji ltar btab tshul du/ /das ni 'bras bu thob par gyur/ /byang chub dam pa nges
176b7(rgyud 'grel): thob pas/ /nga mi bsam pa rdzogs par gyur/ /rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la/ /mi 'gyur sems ni bskyed par gyis/ /gal te skyong pa spang byas na/ /khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas gyur/ /thub pa'i gsung ni zhes gyur nas/ /rgyal po de ni
177a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar gyur/ /'jig rten kun gyis mngon sum du/ /seng ge'i nga rod chig 'di brjod/ /'khor ba'i tha ma med pa yi/ /sngon gyi mdza' ni ji srid pa/ /de srid sems can phan don du/ /spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bya/ /'jig
177a2(rgyud 'grel): rten mgon po'i spyan snga der/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /'gro ba thams cad mgron gnyer te/ /dbul zhing phongs mas dgrol bar bya/ /de ring phan chad gal te yang/ /bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na/ /phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs
177a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur/ /byang chub nam zhig thob par du/ /tha ba'i sems dang 'dod sems dang/ /phra dog dang ni ser sna yang/ /de ring phan chad mi bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad/ /sdig pa'i spyod pa yongs su btang/ /
177a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims sdom dang nges pa la/ /sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya/ /bdag ni byang chub ring tshul du/ /'tshang rgyar mos shing spro ba med/ /phyi mthar thug gi bar du yang/ /sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya/ /tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /
177a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya/ /phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du/ /bdag gi med na thos par bya/ /bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogs pa med/ /bdag gi lhag bsam rnam par dag /bdag dbang 'di na 'dren pa
177a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /lus dang ngag gis las rnams kyang rnam pa kun tu bdag gis spyang/ /yid kyi las kyang skyang bar bya/ /mi dge las ni spyad mi bya/ /ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te/ /'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na/ /bden pa des ni sa 'di yang/ /rnam pa
177a7(rgyud 'grel): drug du g.yos gyur cig /bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa/ /ma nor yang dag smras zhe na/ /bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings las/ /sil snyan dag gi sgra grag shog /bdag la gal te g.yo med cing/ /de bzhin tha ba med ce na/ /manda ra yi me tog ?
177b1(rgyud 'grel): bden pa des ni char du phab/ /yang dag don du nges pa yi/ /tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang/ /phyogs bcu mdza' yas thams cad kyi/ /bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /de yi mod la mkha' dbyings nas/ /sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung/ /me tog manda ra ba
177b2(rgyud 'grel): dag /mi 'grang bdun srid bab par gyur/ /rgyal po de yi rjes bslabs te/ /srog chags bye ba nyi shu yis/ /'dren par bdag cag gyur smon zhes/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags zhes bya ba dang/ gzhan yang de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal
177b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni/ /nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mdza' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi
177b4(rgyud 'grel): khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang dag par btsud pa dang/ bdag gis byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa dang/ bdag gi sbyin pa la yang
177b5(rgyud 'grel): dag par btsud pa dang/ de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab la yang dag par btsud pa dang/ bdag gis bskul ba dang/ bdag gis rjes su bstan par gyur par ma mthong ba
177b6(rgyud 'grel): de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o// //nam bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcur rnam par bltas kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas
177b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid ma? bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu gang yang ma mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das
178a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang bdag gis smon lam 'di skad ces btab ste/ bdag gis ni bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig la gang+gA'i klung du ma'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas zhing rtsam gyi tha grur yangs par yongs su grub cing sangs
178a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing de'i phyi rin po che 'bum phrag du ma las grub pa dang/ rin po che brgya stong du mas spras pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i tshad du ma gyur gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag pa de rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi bar smon lam
178a3(rgyud 'grel): btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i tshad tsam gyis byang chub kyi shing skyes te/ byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad rgyas
178a4(rgyud 'grel): shing khyab par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis byang chub kyi shing de'i drung du bdag 'dug pa'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
178a5(rgyud 'grel): pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub kyi shing drung de nas ma langs kyang bdag gi sprul pa phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dag tu ngang zhing sems can rnams la chos ston
178a6(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming tsam yang ye med par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang dang tha ba dang ?
178a7(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa dang/ tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag par spyod pa sha stag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag cing mngal du skye ba med pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos
178b1(rgyud 'grel): dur smig gyon cing skyil mo krung bcas par brdzus te 'byung ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de shin tu rnam par dag par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba khrag khrig brgya phrag grangs med par gshegs
178b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag theg pa gsum las brtsams te mos pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can la chos ston pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gang
178b3(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis dga' ba'i
178b4(rgyud 'grel): zag dang ldan par 'gyur pas smon lam mdzad blta bu 'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag kha zas kyi 'du shes shig skyes par gyur na de ma thag tu
178b5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig de la de dag gis lag pa g.yas par ngo bra ba brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyis gang ba'i snang mngon du 'byung bar gyur la/ snod de dag byung ma thag tu de dag 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
178b6(rgyud 'grel): ma phul zhing/ sems can dbul zhing ngo pham pas sdug bsngal ba dang/ mgon med par gyur pa ngag dang yi dags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa gang dag lo stong phrag du mar yang mchil ma'i thal ba 'ga' yang mi rnyed pa de lta bu dag yongs su tshim pa ma byas par bdag
178b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis 'gyur ba ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o zhes bgyi bar dran pa thob par gyur cig de'i mod la de dag mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su grub par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan cing nam mkha' las 'phyo ba dang/ rlung ltar thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shugs kyis phyogs bcu ni
179a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa dag tu byin nas kha zas de las de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang phul/ /sems can phongs shing ltogs pa dang/ mgon ma mchis
179a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams dang/ yi dwags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyang yongs su tshim par bgyis nas de dag la chos ston te/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der slar mchi bdag gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/ /bcom ldan
179a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das gzhan yang bdag gis ni bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig skyes pa dag gos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod dang ldan par gyur te/ bsams pa tsam gyis ci la dga' 
179a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gos rin po che dge sbyong gyi tshul dang mthun pa rung ba dag 'byung bar gyur la/ gos rin po che de dag byung ma thag tu 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis gos 'di lta bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul bar bdag cag nyid
179a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis yongs su spyod pa na tshul dang mi 'dra'o snyam pa'i dra pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu mchis shing gos de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
179a6(rgyud 'grel): la mngon par bkab ste/ slar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mchis nas ci dga' ba'i gos rin po che la spyod par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
179a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po de dag gi logs spyod dang/ /yongs su spyod pa gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag la phul nas slad kyis bdag cag yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs
179b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bgyi zhing don mi khom pa brgyad ma mchis pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi dge ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sdug bsngal gyi sgra ma mchis pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na skyon du 'gyur ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi
179b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing ? gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa yid du mi 'ong ba ma mchis par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis smon lam
179b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ? btab ste/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che phye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du mas gang zhing nor bu rin po che du mas spras pas nor bu rin po che kun tu bstan pa 'dra la/ rin po che de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na dkon la sngon chad ma mthong
179b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing mi srid pa sha stag ste/ de dag gi ming brjod na yang lo bye ba brgya stong thogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nor bu rin po che de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su gang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig sangs rgyas
179b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhing 'di gser las grub par mthong ba dga' bo snyam na yang des gser las grub par mthong ba dang/ dngul las grub par mthong bar dga' o snyam na yang dngul las grub par mthong la/ /gzhan gyis gser las grub par mthong ba ma mchis par mi 'gyur
179b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ de bzhin du ? las grub pa dang/ shel las grub pa dang/ mu tig dmar po las grub pa dang/ rdo rje'i snying po las grub pa dang/ spug las grub pa dang/ de bzhin du rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan las grub pa
179b7(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ a ka ru las grub pa 'am/ ta ga ru las grub pa 'am/ ta ma la'i lo ma las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan sprul gyi snying po las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan dmar po las grub pa 'am/ su rnam pa ji ltar grub par 'dod pa de dag gis de bzhin du
180a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong ste/ phan tshun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par mthong ba yang ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub kyi shing de las 'od byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rang rang las 'od
180a2(rgyud 'grel): byung pas snang zhing gsal ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang bla ba'i khod kyang mi mngon/ skar ma dang/ rin po che dang/ zhugs dang/ glog gam sems can gzhan dge gis 'od kyang mi mngon pa dang/ gang dag ji tsam du 'di kyis khyad par dga' 
180a3(rgyud 'grel): ba tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de nyad du de dag gi 'od kyis gsal bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsam pa'i khyad par gyis me tog kha phye ba dang/ kha zum par 'gyur ba dang/
180a4(rgyud 'grel): gang dus dang chos rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su spyad par 'tshal ba de bzhin du de'i grub pa ma gtogs par nyin mtshan gyi ming yang ma mchis pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na grang ba dang tsha ba ma mchis/ rga bar ngan pa dang 'chi ba yang ma mchis
180a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'chal ba de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis shing dga' ldan gyi gnas su tshe bas par gyis nas byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang/ sangs
180a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing de'i steng gi bar snang las sil snyan ltar mi gda' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra'i byin pa dang/ sil snyan de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra mi 'byung gi gzhan du na pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang/
180a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bur mos pa'i sgra de lta bu mos par 'gyur ba dang/ byang
180b1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta 'tshal na 'chag gam 'gro'am/ spod dam/ mchis kyang rung ste gang dag der sangs rgyas blta ba'i yid la bgyi ba skyes ma thag tu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
180b2(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de dag nyid na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur cing/ mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong ma thag gi the tshom mam/ ne ma nur dam/ yid gnyis sam/ chos kyi
180b3(rgyud 'grel): som nyi gang mchis pa yongs su 'chad par 'gyur te/ bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don yongs su 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
180b4(rgyud 'grel): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang/ smon lam gyi rgyan dang/ mtshan nyid dang/ tshad ma dang/ spyod pa dang/ gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan gang
180b5(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed cig mthong ba las nyan thos kyi bkod pa dang/ snyings ma lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs pa de dag thams cad bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dang khongs su chud par bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab ste/ bcom ldan
180b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das bdag 'tshal nas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis sug las gzhan ma mchis par bshad dam/ de bas kyang
180b7(rgyud 'grel): ring du bshad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mdza' thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa smon lam mdza' yas par btab pa de dag yongs su rdzogs shing lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa dang/ phyin ci ma log par tshan par gyur pa ni
181a1(rgyud 'grel): smon lam chen po'o/ /de dag kyang rje btsun 'jam dpal la dad pa rnams kyis smon lam ji skad gsungs pa de lta bu'i smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir cung zad tsam zhig rnam par spros nas bshad
181a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sa legs pa'i blo gros la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag par spyod pa yin no/ /stobs po che la zhes bya ste/ stobs chen po de gang la yod pa de ni stobs po che'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i sa la ni byang chub
181a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i stobs bcu dang ldan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/ /de yang byang chub sems dpa' i stobs bcu ni chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las gsungs te/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/
181a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i stobs dang/ so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang/ bsgom pa'i stobs dang/ bzod pa'i stobs dang/ ye shes kyi stobs dang/ spong ba'i stobs dang/ thos pa'i stobs dang/ spobs pa'i stobs dang/ bsod nams kyi stobs
181a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sgrub pa'i stobs so/ /de la mos pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di lta byang chub sems dpa' ni gang dang gang mos pa de'i de de bzhin du brgyud do/ /de mos pa'i stobs de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis gnon mi nus te/ 'di
181a6(rgyud 'grel): la byang chub sems dpa' i mos pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i so sor rtog pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags skyes pa mi sdug pa bsgoms pas zhi bar byed do/ /zhe sdang skyes la
181a7(rgyud 'grel): byams pa bsgoms pas zhi bar byed do/ /gti mug skyes pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgoms pas zhi bar byed do/ /gshe ba dang mi snyan par zer ba rnams ni brag ca dang mtshungs par shes pas yongs su zhi bar byed do/ /gsod pa dang/ 'ching
181b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ go rar 'jug pa rnams ni las bdag gir bya ba shes pas zhi bar byed do/ /lus la bsdigs pa dang/ lus la gnod pa dang/ lus nyam nga ba rnams ni gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par shes pas zhi bar byed do/ /de ltar kun nas nyon mongs
181b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' i rnam par dag pa'i sgo yang de snyed du mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i so sor rtog pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i sgom pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ gang mos pas spyad pa'i sa dang/ mthong
181b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sa la bar ma chod par byed pa'i chos de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de la bar chad byed mi nus so/ /des mthong ba de dang lam de las lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dbral bar mi nus te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i bsgom pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/ /
181b4(rgyud 'grel): de la byang chub sems dpa' i bzod pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ gang gis phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni spyod pa brag ca'i sgra dang emtshungs pa'i shes pa'i stobs kyis slar spyo bar mi bya'o/ /bsdigs shing brdegs kyang gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par 'du shes pas slar mi
181b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdigs mi brdeg go /gshe yang sems sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid du 'du shes pa'i stobs kyi slar mi gshe'o/ /khros kyang nad rnam par dag par shes pa'i stobs kyis slar mi khro bo/ /'jig rten gyi chos rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi chos
181b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis mi 'phrogs so/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par dag pa shes pa'i stobs kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khrug pa'i sgo ji snyed mthong bar rab tu zhi ba'i sgo yang de snyed du mthong ste/
181b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni bzod pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i ye shes kyi stobs gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched shes pa de dag ni stong pa/ /ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa'o/ /ye shes gang gis sangs
182a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa de las mu stegs can dang dmigs pa can thams cad dang/ bdud thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su gnas pas kyang ye shes de la the tshom za bar byed mi nus pa 'di ni
182a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i spong ba'i stobs gang zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnas gcig na gnas pa'i gan du sems can thams cad lhags te/ kha ngan zer/ mi snyan pa
182a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ tshig brlang ba dang/ tshig dU ba po smra/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi mi bsngags pa brjod kyang/ de sems can de dag la mi 'khrug cing/ yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'gyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /bag la nyal bar mi byed do//
182a4(rgyud 'grel): ?? la gtubs kyang de bzhin du bag la nyal mi bskyed do/ /sems can de dag kyang dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dgod de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i spong ba'i stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' thos pa'i stobs gang
182a5(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mang du thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa rgya mtsho thos pa bsags pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thos pa'i stobs de lta bu dang ldan no/ /gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i
182a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad the tshom bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i gan du lhags nas gang sems can gcig gi 'dri ba de gzhan mi 'dri bar thams cad kyis the tshom tha dad par lan gcig tu dris kyang byang chub sems dpa' thags thogs
182a7(rgyud 'grel): med par lan gcig tu 'debs so/ /bskal pa brgya stong du dris kyang de bzhin du lung ston to/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i thos pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i spobs pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' 
182b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i nang du chos ston na/ de mi sems mi rtogs par sems can gang dang gang gi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston cing thos par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' i chos ston pa de don nyams par mi 'gyur/ tshig 'bru
182b2(rgyud 'grel): nyams par mi 'gyur/ tshig zlos par mi 'gyur/ thogs par mi 'gyur/ gcod par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i spobs pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i bsod nams kyi stobs gang zhe na/ gal te byang chub
182b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' shing drung na gnas pa dang/ gtsug lag khang na gnas kyang rung/ khyim stong pa na gnas kyang rung/ bdud thams cad 'khor dang bcas te lhags nas bgegs bya ba/ brtse ba'i phyir nan tan byed na de la bdud de dag bdag nyid 'jigs
182b4(rgyud 'grel): skrag myos shing gyes te/ bdag mgon med par shes nas 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /gang bdud de dag gi ral gri dang/ 'tshon rtse gnyis pa dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ rdo ba dang/ sta re 'bab pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' i bsod nams kyi byin gyis
182b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i me tog dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ snga ma'i me tog dang/ utpa la dang/ pad+mar gyur nas 'bab bo/ /gang bdud de dag gi tshig rtsub po dang/ tshig brlang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' la bstod par grag go /byang chub sems dpa' la ni
182b6(rgyud 'grel): nam yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i yul drug snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bsams dang tsam gyis de'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nam mkha' las 'byung ngo/ /de yang de'i rang gi bsod nams kyi dbang gis nam mkha' i mdzod dang/ lag na rin po che las phun sum tshogs
182b7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de yi rang gi bsod nams kyi dbang gis lag na rin po che de ni tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas te/ brjod kyang byang chub sems dpa' i bsod nams kyi stobs kyis mdza' rtogs par sla ba
183a1(rgyud 'grel): ma yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i bsod nams kyi stobs zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i sgrub pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' i sgrub pa'i stobs ni rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
183a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa bsgrub pa dang/ tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ bzod pa bsgrub pa dang/ brtson 'grus bsgrub pa dang/ bsam gtan bsgrub pa dang/ shes rab bsgrub pa dang/ thabs bsgrub pa dang/ smon lam bsgrub pa dang/ stobs bsgrub pa dang/
183a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bsgrub pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i sgrub pa rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sgrub pa bcu po 'di'i nang du 'dus par blta'o/ /
183a4(rgyud 'grel): de la byang chub sems dpa' i sbyin pa bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i chos gang gis sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba ma gtogs par sems can rnams la mi sbyin pa gang yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' i
183a5(rgyud 'grel): sems gang gis sbyin pa byin pa'i sems de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa ma gtogs par sems can gzhan rnams kyis dad par sla ba ma yin no/ shes par 'gyur pa lta ci smos te/ 'di
183a6(rgyud 'grel): ni byang chub sems dpa' i sbyin pa bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims bsgrub pa ni rnam pa bcu'o/ /rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan
183a7(rgyud 'grel): thos kyi sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud ba'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa bsgrub pa dang/
183b1(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu tshol ba mi gtong ba'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ /dam? pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ rtag tu gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ /byang chub tu yongs
183b2(rgyud 'grel): su bsngo ba'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa dang/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i yang dag par 'joms pa la bzod pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims bsgrub pa'o/ /byang chub sems
183b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams kyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul khrims can yin te/ /de dag gi tshul khrims bsgrub pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa rnams kyis shes par sla ba ma yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems
183b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i bzod pa bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' i rnams kyi ? bsgrub pa ni rnam pa gsum mo/ /rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang/ /gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa la mi mdzed pa'i
183b5(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa dang/ /chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa'o/ /sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa ni las bdag gir bya ba la shes pa la 'jug pa'o/ /gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa la mi mdzed pa'i bzod pa ni sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa
183b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du ? pa la 'jug pa'o/ /chos la nges par sems dpa' i bzod pa ni chos thams cad skye ba med par shes pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i bzod pa rnam pa gsum zhes bya'o/ /gang bzod pa 'di dag bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub
183b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bzod pa bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i brtson 'grus bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ /'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gang dang gang du ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grub par bya ba'i sbyor ba de dang de 'du shes 'di ltar
184a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos 'di yongs su bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i brtson 'grus pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ byang
184a2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs pa/ zhi ba sems dang yid dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba ma skyes ma 'gags shing
184a3(rgyud 'grel): ma g.yo ba thob par mthong ngo/ /de bdag ni mnyam par bzhag la gzhan ni rnam par g.yengs pa'i snyam du mi sems so/ /bdag dang gzhan las rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ byang chub yang dag par
184a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus kyang mi nyams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i bsam gtan bsgrub pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i shes rab bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las rnam par grol ba
184a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gang stong pa nyid las rnam par grol ba dang/ gang mtshan ma med pa las rnam par grol ba dang/ /gang smon pa med pa las rnam par grol ba dang/ gang nam mkha' las rnam par grol ba'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ byang
184a6(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi lam dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i brtson 'grus kyang mi nyams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i shes rab bsgrub pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i thabs bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag kyang mi
184a7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs la/ rtag tu bdag nyid kyis sbed pa yang spyod do/ /sems can yang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i brtson pa yang spyod do/ /nyon mongs pa yang mi dmigs la rtag tu dbang po rnams sbed pa yang spyod do/
184b1(rgyud 'grel): de la gang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs ma yin pa'i gzugs cung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba 'dod pa yang yin no/ /de la gang chos kyi sgra ma yin pa'i sgra gang yang grag par mi 'gyur la/ rtag tu chos nyan pas ngoms
184b2(rgyud 'grel): mi myong ba yang yin no/ /'khor ba yang mi dmigs la/ rtag tu 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa yang yin no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ mya ngan las 'das pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bdog pa thams
184b3(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs su gtong bar yang byed do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyang mi dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam brgya stong mang po yang mngon par bsgrub ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i thabs bsgrub pa zhes bya'o//
184b4(rgyud 'grel): de la byang chub sems dpa' i smon lam bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni chos gang yang 'bri ba 'am 'phel bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la yang rjes su yi rang nas bla na
184b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed do/ /rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /bdag
184b6(rgyud 'grel): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar gyur cig /'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra bar gyur cig /ces bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de'i smon lam de yang yang dag par 'grub pa ste/ mi 'grub par mi
184b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshul khrims ma zhig pa/ ma nyams pa/ 'dren ma ma yin pa/ ma gyur pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa bsrung ngo/ /de tshul khrims de la rab tu gnas pas sems smon pa 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i smon lam
185a1(rgyud 'grel): grub pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i stobs bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ gal te la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bsgyur nas byang chub sems dpa' i gan du 'ongs te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las zlog par byed/
185a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dun bzlog par byed/ dbral bar byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de 'dun ba zlog par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub nyid rjes su dran no/ /byang chub kyi snying po rjes su dran no/ /bdud 'dul ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang/ snying rje
185a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po mngon du byed do/ /sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'dun pa zlog par byed/ dbral bar byed/ rnam par zlog par byed pa'i sems can de la yang byang chub sems dpa' i khong khro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ sems can de la byams pa
185a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang snying rje chen po bskyed de/ dad pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab kyi stobs las kyang mi nyams te/ de'i phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs des sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag sangs
185a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu 'god/ rab tu 'dzud de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i stobs bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i ye shes bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di la skye ba 'am 'chi
185a6(rgyud 'grel): ba 'am rga ba yang med do/ /'di dag ni chos tsam du zad de/ bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o/ /zhes chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ye shes kyi stobs de nyid kyis sems can dpag tu med par?
185a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa dag ye shes kyi stobs de rab tu 'god do/ /sems can thams cad kyis chos nyid de las rnam par bzlog nas 'jig rten gyi chos rnams las rab tu 'jog mi nus te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i ye shes bsgrub pa'o/ /'di
185b1(rgyud 'grel): ni sgrub pa rnam pa bcu ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' i stobs bcu zhes bya ste/ stobs mdza' yas pa gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang rnam par smin pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' i sa legs pa'i blo gos la mngon par 'gyur bas stobs pa che la
185b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o// //byang chub sems dpa' i sa chos kyi sprin la ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag par spyod pas na ye shes rgya mtsho'o/ /de yang rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas rgya mtsho ste/ rgya mtsho ni 'jug par dka' ba nyid dang/ ro gcig pa 'di
185b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi gnas su gyur ba dang/ sems can dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gyur par chos mthun pa can no/ /de bzhin du ye shes rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste/ nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal dang/ tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen
185b4(rgyud 'grel): po la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'jug mi nus pa dang/ stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa dang/ skye gnas dang 'gro ba dang/ rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba'i sems can rnams nyon mongs
185b5(rgyud 'grel): pa las ldog cing bde ba 'thob ste/ mchog tu dbugs 'byin pa'i 'tshang rgya ba nyid kyi gnas su gyur pas sems can dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho de lta bu dang tha mi dad pa'i ye shes ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs yin pas
185b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de las byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa gang zhe na/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dag gi ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub ste/ de dag la
185b7(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang zhe na/ gang 'di ye shes yongs su tshol ba la rab tu 'dun pa/ ye shes rtogs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rtag tu bsten pa dang/ 'grogs pa dang/ bsten bkur byed pa dang/ gang yang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
186a1(rgyud 'grel): la rton cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mi rton pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la nga rgyal med cing bla ma bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang/ ston pa bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa ste/ dge ba'i
186a2(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen de dag gis kyang 'di bsam pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas 'brel ba'i gtam dang ye shes kyi gtam sgrub par byed do/ /snod du rig nas rgyun mi 'chad par phyi rol ma yin pa'i chos ston to/ /des chos de dag thos nas chos kyi tshogs
186a3(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor bar byed de/ gang chos kyi tshogs la sbyor ba de ni de ye shes kyi tshogs yin no/ /de la chos kyi tshogs la sbyor ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di don nyung ba dang/ bya ba nyung ba dang/ smra ba nyung ba dang/ yo byad nyung ba dang/ nam gyi cha stong dang nam
186a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi cha smad la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang/ thos pa'i don la rtog pa dang/ yang dang yang tshol ba dang/ sems la rnyog pa med pa dang/ sgrib pa rnams rnam par sel ba dang/ lhung ba rnams las byung ba shes pa dang/ 'gyod pa med
186a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ kun nas ltung ba med pa dang/ sgrub pa la snying por byed pa dang/ /chos la gzhol ba dang/ chos la 'bab pa dang/ rtul ba dang ldan pa dang/ ye shes tshol ba la mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bu
186a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ de la ma chags par gnas pa dang/ tshul khrims la mi lhod pa dang/ /brtson pa mi gtong ba dang/ khyad par du 'gro ba dang/ 'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang/ gcig pur dga' ba dang/ dgon pa la mngon du phyogs shing yid la
186a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang/ 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag las mi g.yo ba dang/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'i sngags dran par 'dzin pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol
186b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ brjed pa med pa dang/ don rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang/ blo gros kyi lam dang mthun pa dang/ brtan pas sdom pa dang/ rkyen rnams kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang/ de tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pas brgyan pa dang/ ye shes kyi rjes su
186b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba lhur len pa dang/ mi shes pa sel ba dang/ ma rig pa dang/ gti mug gi mun pa dang/ rab rib kyi ling tog gis tshed pa bsal ba dang/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang/ blo shin tu rnam par dag pa dang/ blo rgya che ba dang/ blo ma
186b3(rgyud 'grel): zhum pa dang/ blo ma gyes pa dang/ mngon sum du shes pa dang/ yon tan gzhan la rag ma lus pa dang/ bdag gi yon tan mi bsnyems pa dang/ gzhan gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa dang/ legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang/ las kyi rnam
186b4(rgyud 'grel): par smin pa dang/ 'gal bar mi byed pa dang/ las yongs su dag pa'i ye shes te/ btsun pa shA radwA ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa bzhi
186b5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa bzhi po 'di dag ni ye shes tshogs rab tu bsags par 'gyur te/ bzhi po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos smra ba rnams la grog dang/ smyug gu dang/ snag tsha dang glegs bam sbyin pa dang/ chos smra ba rnams
186b6(rgyud 'grel): la chos kyi snyan sna tshogs sbyin pa dang/ chos smra ba rnams la rnyed pa dang bku bsti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad sbyin pa dang/ chos smra ba rnams la chos bsdu ba'i phyir g.yo med par legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa ste/ sbyin pa bzhi po de/
186b7(rgyud 'grel): dag ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /srung ba bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos smra ba rnams rdze bo bzhin du bsrung ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung
187a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ yul dang ljongs kyi phyogs bsrung ba dang/ phan pa'i dngos po bsrung ba ste/ srung ba bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nye bar ston pa bzhi po 'di dag ni
187a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos smra ba rnams la zang zing gis nye bar ston pa dang/ chos kyis nye bar ston pa dang/ shes rab kyis nye bar ston pa dang/ ye shes kyis nye bar
187a3(rgyud 'grel): ston pa ste bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stobs lnga po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i phyir
187a4(rgyud 'grel): dad pa'i stobs dang/ thos ba tshol ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ byang chub kyi sems dpa' mi brjed pa'i phyir dran pa'i stobs dang/ mnyam pa nyid la sems nges par sems pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ thos pa'i stobs
187a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyir shes rab kyi stobs te/ stobs lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par
187a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos la rab tu dga' ba'i tshul khrims dang/ chos yongs su tshol ba'i tshul khrims dang/ chos la nges par sems pa'i tshul khrims dang/ byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims te
187a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos
187b1(rgyud 'grel): tshol ba la brtson pas ngan du brjod pa dang/ ngan du smra ba'i tshig lam bzod pa dang/ chos? tshol ba la brtson pas rlung dang/ nyi ma dang/ grang ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom pa bzod pa dang/ chos tshol ba la brtson pas mkhan po dang/ slob dpon
187b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mthun par 'jug pa'i bzod pa dang/ chos tshol ba la brtson pas stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i chos la bzod pa ste/ bzod pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' i rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
187b3(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ brtan pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ nan tan
187b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi brtson 'grus te/ /brtson 'grus bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs
187b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dben pa dang rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan dang/ mngon par shes pa tshol dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rton pa ste/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
187b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi snang ba bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad pa la mi gnas pa dang/ rtag pa la mi
187b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ mi 'gal ba dang/ bdag med pa la bzod pa ste/ shes rab kyi snang ba bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thabs bzhi po
188a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang/ sems can gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa
188a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ thabs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /lam bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/
188a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang/ sa'i lam dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi lam ste/ lam bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs
188a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mi ngoms pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pas mi ngoms pa dang/ bstan pas mi ngoms pa dang/ dpyod pas
188a5(rgyud 'grel): mi ngoms pa dang/ shes pas mi ngoms pa ste/ mi ngoms pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su
188a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba dang/ chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /sbyin pa las kyang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs su blta'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab las kyang ye shes
188a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs rdzogs su blta'o/ /byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms las kyang ye shes kyi tshogs su blta ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' i rtsom pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ye shes kyi grub pa/
188b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ye shes la rton pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gnas pa'i phyir te/ ye shes dang ldan pa thams cad la rton pa yin no/ /bdud thams cad kyis kyang de la glags mi rnyed do/ /de la sangs rgyas chos kyi snod thams cad kyang
188b2(rgyud 'grel): nye bar gnas pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlags kyang 'thob po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob par byed de/ 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya ste/ sbyor ba de dag gnas skabs la 'di ni sbyor ba na yang rnam
188b3(rgyud 'grel): par sprin pa'i sa la rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ lhun gyis grub pa dang/ rnam par mi rtog pa dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pas ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs
188b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs nyid yin pas bcom ldan 'das ni ye shes kyi tshigs te/ tshigs su bcad pa dang mi mthun par tshig gzhan du bstan pa ni sa'i rim pas bshad pas na nyes pa med do// //da ni tshangs pa'i gnas
188b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/ /snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /shes rab chen po blo chen ldan/ /mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' 
188b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ btang snyoms bzhi ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ste/ tshangs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /de'i don du gnas pas na tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o/ /de la byams pa ni gsum ste/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang/ chos
188b7(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa'o/ /de yang dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pas na byams chen rang bzhin te/ de nyid kyis na dpag tu med pa'o/ /de yang blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las gsungs te/ btsun
189a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sha ratwA ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa yang mi zad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thug pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni thug pa med par byas te/ de dag gi byams
189a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nye bar sgrub pa yongs su chad pa med do/ /'di ltar sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa'i sems bskyed pas khyab par byed do/ /btsun pa sha ratwA ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' i khams
189a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di sgar yang ma khyab pa med do/ /btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i byams pa 'dis gang ma khyab pa'i sems can de gang yang med do/ /'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gyi khams ni tshad med de/ de la
189a4(rgyud 'grel): zad pa med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i byams pa bsgom pa yang tshad med de/ de la zad pa med de 'di ltar nam mkha' la mi zad pas na sems can mi zad do/ /sems can mi zad pas na byams pa'i mi zad de/ de'i phyir skyes bu
189a5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa de dag byams pa mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang/ gnas brtan sha ratwA ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gyi khams 'di ji tsam/ blo gros mi
189a6(rgyud 'grel): zad pa la smras pa/ btsun pa sha ratwA ti'i bu sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams ji snyed pa de bas kyang sems can gyi khams ches mang ngo/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dpe bya bar mi nus sam/ blo gros
189a7(rgyud 'grel): mi zad pas smras ba/ btsun pa sha ratwA ti'i bu nus mod kyi/ rgyu chung dus ni ma yin no/ /btsun pa sha ratwA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang
189b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du nub phyogs dang/ de bzhin du byang phyogs dang/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re re yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag thams cad rgya mtsho chen po chus yongs su gang ba gcig tu gyur la/ sems can gang+gA'i klung
189b2(rgyud 'grel): gi bye ma snyed 'dus te/ skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i chas de la chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs la/ de bzhin du gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'dus te bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i
189b3(rgyud 'grel): chas chu'i thigs pa gnyis blangs la mtshan ma bzhag pa 'di dang/ bgrang ba 'di lta bus bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cing sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i chas chu'i thigs pa re re blangs pas chu'i
189b4(rgyud 'grel): phung po de tsam zad par gyur kyang sems can gyi khams de ni zad pa 'am mdza' thug pa gang yang med do/ /btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bus ji ltar sems can gyi khams tshang med de/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' i byams pas khyab par byed do /
189b5(rgyud 'grel): btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi byams pa de lta bu bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa de zad par nus sam/ smras ba/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'dra ba zad par su 'dod pa de ni
189b6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' zad par 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis byams pa mi zad pa 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur na de dag kyang byams pa mi zad par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/ btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu byams pa ni
189b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag bsrung zhing gzhan la phan par gnas pa ste/ mchog tu rtsod pa med pa dang/ gnod sems kyi tha ba'i skyon dang/ khro ba dang khon du 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'o/ /bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba dang/ bral ba ste/ dad pa skyed cing
190a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul pa la nyes par mi blta ba'o/ /yongs su gdung ba med cing lus dang sems bde ba bskyed pa ste/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba las shin tu 'das pa'o/ /nyes pa thams cad kyi 'jigs
190a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bral ba ste/ 'phags pa'i lam dang/ mthun zhing gshe ba dang/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dad par byed pa/ yul thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ dbyug pa dang mtshon cha 'chad pa ma yin no/ /sems can thams cad
190a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu thar par bya ba la dga' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang bral ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gsag dang/ thob kyis 'jal ba thams cad dang bral ba/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa thams cad 'byung bar byed pa
190a4(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi phyag byas pa/ rang gi gzi brjid kyi rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa/ byis pa thams cad srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams
190a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ma 'dres pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thar pa'i lam gyi mchog theg pa thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa/ zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi bzung ba/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i
190a6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis zil gyi mi non pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ dbang po nyams pa dang ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa/ bde 'gro thams cad dang
190a7(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ ngan song thams cad dang mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ 'dod pa dang longs spyod kyi dbang phyug la mngon par dga' pa med pa sems
190b1(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang/ sbyin pa'i sbyor ba tha dad pa dang bral ba/ tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa thams cad yongs su skyab pa/ bzod pa'i stobs ston pa/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/
190b2(rgyud 'grel): dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba 'phags pa rnams 'jug pa'i bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba mi 'khrug pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams shing yang dag par sbyor ba bya ba thams cad las yang dag par sgrol ba/ bsam
190b3(rgyud 'grel): gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pas nyon mongs pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba/ gsang sngags dang thos pa 'dzin pas nges par sems pa'i shes rab kyi rgyu bskyed pa/ rang gi phyogs dang gzhan
190b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyogs la nges pa/ bdud kyi phyogs dang nyon mongs pa rnams bsal ba/ 'grogs na bde ba/ bsnyen bkur dang 'jug pa'i rgyu mthun pa la sems pa/ spyod lam srung bar byed pa/ rgod pa thams cad las 'das pa/ nga rgyal gyi las sel ba/ ngo
190b5(rgyud 'grel): tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pas byug shing dri zhim pa ste/ bag chags dang mtshams sbyor pa dang nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba sbyong ba'o/ /btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu byams pa ni dri zhim pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste byams pa chen po
190b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bdag gi bde ba gtong zhing sems can rnams la bde ba sbyin pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ratwa'i ti'i bu byams pa ni chu
190b7(rgyud 'grel): bo las sgrol pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu byams pa ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa'o/ /sems can la
191a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa'i byams pa ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/ /chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/ /dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni mi skye
191a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos la bzod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ste/ btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa mi zad pa zhes bya ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mi zad pa ji skad gsungs pa de lta
191a3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i byams pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur pas/ byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med ces bya'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po blo yi mchog ces bya ba gsungs te/ thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i ngo
191a4(rgyud 'grel): bo nyid yin pas snying rje chen po'o/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni shes rab kyi mchog yin pas blo yi mchog go /'di yang byams pa bzhin du sems can dpag tu med pa la dmigs par brjod par bya'o/ /de bas na snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i
191a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzhan gyi don phyir tshogs thams cad nye bar sogs par 'gyur ba ste/ de yang btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po yang mi zad pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
191a6(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dbugs 'gyur ba dang rdub pa ni skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' i snying rje chen po
191a7(rgyud 'grel): ni sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che ni rin po che sna bdun gyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa la
191b1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po ni sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon na ma khyim bdag gcig pu gcig bu la snying thag pa nas sdug par 'dzin pa de bzhin du snying rje chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad snying thag
191b2(rgyud 'grel): pa nas sdug par 'dzin pa yin no/ /btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu snying rje chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di bdag nyid kyis byas pa na de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /rang gis byas pas na snying rje chen po'o/ /gzhan gyi skabs mi rnyed pas na snying rje chen po'o zhes
191b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa ste/ gang gi phyir de lta bu ni snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin la/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ nges par 'byung ba thams cad kyi rgyu yin par shes par bya ste/ de bas na blo yi mchog ces bya'o// //
191b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab chen po blo chen ldan zhes bya ba ni dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yin te/ de la dga' ba chen po gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dran pa dang/ rjes su dran pa dang dga' ba dang mos pa dang/ mchog tu dga' 
191b5(rgyud 'grel): ba de la ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/ chos thams cad khor du chud pas dga' bar 'gyur ba de ni shes rab med na mi 'byung bas shes rab nyid rgyu yin te/ des bas na shes rab chen po zhes bya ste/ gang la shes rab chen po yod pa de ni shes rab chen
191b6(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /rab tu dga' pa'i shes rab brnyes nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la thugs gzhol bas na blo chen ldan zhes bya ste/ dri ma med pa'i blo gros ni blo'o/ /yul thams cad pa ni che ba ste/ de lta bu'i shes rab gang la mnga' 
191b7(rgyud 'grel): ba de ni blo chen ldan zhes bya'o/ /de la dga' ba dang de'i ngo bo nyid brjod par bya ste/ de yang sems mi 'gong zhing mi brdzi ba dang/ srid pa med pa dang/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad gtong ba dang/ chos kyi dga' ba thams cad kyi rten dang/ sems
192a1(rgyud 'grel): ma mchog tu dga' pa dang/ lus rab tu sim pa dang/ sangs rgyas la dga' zhing yi rang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dga' zhing mos pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan tshol la mkhas pa dang/ dga' ba'i
192a2(rgyud 'grel): chos nyan bas mi skyo ba dang/ de kho na'i chos la rton pa'i nan tan dang/ dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' bas chos la mos pa dang/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa'i blo dang
192a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba la shin tu 'dun pa dang/ chos la 'dun pa yang mi 'dor ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la mod shing rnam par grol ba dang/ nyi tshe ba'i thag pa bsal te sems bskyed pa dang/ ser sna med pas ma
192a4(rgyud 'grel): zhum par sems bskyed pa dang/ slong ba la sbyin pa byin nas 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyangs pa dang/ sbyin pa la mchog tu dga' ba dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la dad pa dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la rjes su
192a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin cing byams pa dang/ rang gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar dbugs 'byin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims la yongs su bsngo ba dang/ bstan zhing
192a6(rgyud 'grel): mi byed pa dang/ pha rol ngan du brjod pa dang/ ngan du smra ba tshig gi lam la khong khro med pa'i sems kyis bzod cing nges pa dang/ nga rgyal med pa dang/ bla ma la 'dud cing ri mor byed pa dang/ rtag tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang/
192a7(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer med pa dang/ gsong por smra ba dang/ tshul 'chos pa med pa dang/ kha gsag med pa dang/ thob kyi 'jal ba med pa dang/ bsam pa dag pa dang/ sems la brlang ba med pa dang/ gya gyu med pa dang/ thams cad la
192b1(rgyud 'grel): phan yon du blta ba dang/ skyon med par blta ba dang/ ltung ba mi gleng ba dang/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa ltar phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ chos rnams la bdag
192b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la srog bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ bla ma rnams la pham bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ sems can rnams la bu bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la sangs rgyas bzhin du phangs su 'dzin
192b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ nan tan rnams la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rkang lag bzhin du 'phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ chos smra ba rnams la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang/
192b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad la yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ rjes su bstan pa rnams la dga' ba'i rtsed mo bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ chog shes pa rnams la nad med pa bzhin du phangs su 'dzin
192b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ chos 'tshal ba rnams la sman bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang/ bskul zhing ngan par byed pa rnams la sman pa bzhin du sangs rgyas su 'dzin pa ste/ btsun pa shA ratwA ti'i bu de ltar gang dbang po thams cad la dbang po ma 'god pa 'di ni
192b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba chen po zhes bya'o/ /dga' ba chen po zhes bya ba ni rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyir zhi ba'i rnam pa'o/ /mi rgod pa'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'i rnam pa'o/ /khongs pa ma yin pa'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa'i rnam pa'o/ /rnam par mi g.yang ba'i phyir dbang po
192b7(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i rnam pa'o/ /mi nyams pa'i brtul zhugs kyi rnam pa'o/ /'dod pa'i phyir nges pa'i rnam pa'o/ /dka' blo bde ba'i phyir thos pa'i rnam pa'o/ /sems las su rung ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i rnam pa'o/ /las legs par byas pa'i phyir
193a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i rnam pa'o/ /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa'o/ /ma g.yos pa'i phyir shin tu gnas pa'i rnam pa'o/ /mi gnas pa'i phyir ma g.yos pa'i rnam pa'o/ /thul bar dka' ba'i phyir snyen dka' ba'i rnam
193a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /chung mi za ba'i phyir don gyi rnam pa'o/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi bden pa'i rnam pa'o/ /de byed pa'i phyir de kho na'i rnam pa'o/ /stobs kyi phyir spro ba'i rnam pa'o/ /mi rdzi ba'i phyir stobs kyi rnam pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa
193a3(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du tshol? bas mi skyo ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rnam pa ste/ de lta bu'i dga' ba'i ngo bo ni bcom ldan 'das yin zhes ston par 'gyur ro/ /mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms chen
193a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ de yang thabs chen po gang la mnga' ba de ni thabs chen po zhes bya'o/ /gnas skabs 'dir btang snyoms chen po ni thabs chen po ste/ bsam pa sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i gdul bya'i
193a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir ro/ /de yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang/ bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i btang snyoms dang/ dus
193a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dus ma yin pa la btang snyoms pa'o/ /de la nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa ni bsti stang du byas pas mthos par mi sems pa dang/ bsti stang du ma byas pas ngams par mi sems pa dang/ rnyed pa dag la rlom sems med pa dang/ ma rnyed pa
193a7(rgyud 'grel): dag la yi chad pa med pa dang/ snyen pa dag la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang/ mi snyan pa la zhum pa med pa dang/ smad pas sro shi bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ bsngags pa la chos nyid rab tu gnas pa dang/ sdug bsngal dag la so sor rtog pa'i
193b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang/ bde ba dag la mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar rtog pa'i stobs dang/ rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang/ khong khro ba spong bas mdza' ba dang/ /mi mdza' ba dag la sems mnyam pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa
193b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la blo mnyam pa dang/ legs par byas pa dag dang nyes par byas pa rnams la yang gnyis su mi byed pa dang/ sdug pa dang mi sdug par mi blta ba dang/ legs par thos pa dang nyes par thos pa la mi 'byed pa dang/ legs par smras pa dang nyes par smra
193b3(rgyud 'grel): pa la bag la nyal med pa dang/ ro myong ba'i nyes dmigs rnams la mtshungs par yongs su 'jal ba dang/ sems can thams cad la bsam pa mnyam pa dang/ lus dang srog la mi blta ba dang/ rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams la 'od zer mnyam pa dang/
193b4(rgyud 'grel): bsngags pa dang bsngags pa ma yin pa rnams la sems mnyam pa dang/ bde ba dang mi bde ba rnams la rang gi sems yongs su dag  pa ste/ btsun pa shA radwA ti'i bu de ltar gang bsti stang du byed pa dang/ gnod par byed pa la mtho dman du mi sems shing
193b5(rgyud 'grel): de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin te/ btsun pa shA radwA ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ 'di
193b6(rgyud 'grel): la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad kyang khong khro bar mi byed cing mi tshol te/ btang snyoms pa yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba las sam/ ngag gi rnam par 'gyur ba las kyang rung ste/ gnyis ka las bzod pas na de'i
193b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /mig gi rnam pas kyang rma mi phyin/ gzugs kyi rnam pa las kyang rma mi phyin te/ gnyis kas kyang rma mi phyin to/ /de bzhin du rna bas ma yin/ sgras ma yin/ snas ma yin/ dris ma yin/ lces ma yin/ ros ma yin/ lus kyis
194a1(rgyud 'grel): ma yin/ reg byas ma yin/ yid kyi rnam pas kyang rma mi phyin/ chos kyi rnam pas kyang rma mi phyin te/ de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /rma mi phyin cing nyams pa med pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o/ /rma phyung ba la rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir
194a2(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga bsrung bas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /phan par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa la mnyam par sbyor bas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /btang snyoms ni mchog tu rtsod pa med pa'o/ /btang
194a3(rgyud 'grel): snyoms ni rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'o/ /btang snyoms ni gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba'o/ /btang snyoms ni bdag la rtog pa'o/ /btang snyoms ni sems can gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o/ /btang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa' i mnyam
194a4(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag pa'i gnas skabs yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i btang snyoms zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' i dus dang dus ma yin pa la btang snyoms gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
194a5(rgyud 'grel): ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du btang snyoms bya ba bka' stsal to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu bdag dang gzhan gyi dge ba'i chos btsal ba la brtson zhing 'bad par bya ba'i phyir te/ des dus dang dus ma yin
194a6(rgyud 'grel): par btang snyoms par bya'o/ /de la dus dang dus ma yin pa'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ snod du gyur pa ma yin pa dang/ nyan par mi 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms pa dang/ ma rnyed pa dang/ smad pa dang mi snyan pa dang sdug bsngal ba
194a7(rgyud 'grel): la btang snyoms pa dang/ sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa can skyon med pa la zhugs pa rnams la btang snyoms dang/ sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang/ tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang/ bzod 
194b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus na brtson 'grus brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dus na bsam gtan brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang/ bsam gtan gyi dus na sbyin pa la chags pa brtul ba'i btang snyoms dang/ shes rab kyi dus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la dmigs pa la
