349a7(rgyud 'grel): ro zhes bya ba ni nyes par spyod pa'i las thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /kun nas mdzes pa dang/ gzugs dang kha dog dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro/ /'jig rten pa
349b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang 'grogs na bde ba dang mthong na dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang snying rje'i mig gnyis kyi sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir ro/ /'jig rten pa rnams la mdzes pa dang skal ba dang ldan
349b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la nges par ston pa'i phyir ro/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba chos kyi sbyin pa la bslabs pa'i phyir ro/ /longs spyod kyi gzhi che
349b3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ 'khor mang po dang/ longs spyod kyi gzhi mi zad pa dang 'khor mi zad par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bdag gis thams cad yongs su gtong ba la bslabs pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi mchog dang yon tan mchog dang yang
349b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni dri ma med pa'i shes pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis ngo bo nyid byang chub kyi sems mi
349b5(rgyud 'grel): brjed pa'i phyir ro/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la yang gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms la gus par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /dran pa dang/ shes bzhin dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/
349b6(rgyud 'grel): smon lam dang/ ye shes dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'i lam 'thob pa las so/ /bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang smra mkhas par yang 'gyur ro/ /mi blun pa dang tshig gsal
349b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang sgrin por yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa'i shes rab 'thob pa'i phyir ro/ /bshes gnyen can dang/ le lo med pa dang/ chog shes pa dang/ nor mang ba dang/ sred pa med par yang 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni chos thams
350a1(rgyud 'grel): cad sgyu ma lta bu'i rtogs pas brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum 'thob pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can thams cad kyis mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang slob dpon dang bla mar bkur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni mchog tu
350a2(rgyud 'grel): yid brtan pa'i gnas kyi don dang/ las so sor rtog pa'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /des sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang sgyu rtsal dang mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang yi ge'i sgo nas shes
350a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i sgo mngon sum du byas pa'i phyir ro/ /tshul khrims dang 'tsho ba dang kun tu spyod pa shin tu yongs su dag par
350a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa dang legs par rab tu byung ba dang legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa las ldog pa'i kho bo nyid kyis chos rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa
350a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /nyan thos dang dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa la rnams kyang 'jug
350a6(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni theg pa de la mngon par 'dod pa med pa nyid dang/ theg pa gcig gi tshul la mkhas pa'i phyir ro/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang de ltar na yon tan dpag tu med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rnam
350a7(rgyud 'grel): pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag de ni bsod nams dang
350b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags shing/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams shin tu myur du bsgrubs nas ring por mi thogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal ba mang por
350b2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba' i chos su mi 'gyur bar sems can thams cad la bla na med pa'i chos ston pa dang/ phyogs bcur dam pa'i chos kyi rnga sgra chen po rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste/
350b3(rgyud 'grel): myur du mngon par shes pas so zhes bya ba ni tshig gis lhag pa'o/ /oM sarba d+harmA b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ti pa ri shud+d+hA(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA ya du ta sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+ha tA mu pA dA ye ti/ a A:
350b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ra oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga pAM dz+nyA na murt+ti bA gI shwa ra ma hA bA tsa sarba d+harma ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shu d+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha aSha(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di thog ma dang tha ma bar du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir gsungs te/
350b5(rgyud 'grel): de yang yi ge a ni byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid can no/ /A ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /oM ni sangs rgyas nyid ston pa'o/ /a ni mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston par byed pa'o/ /A ni ye
350b6(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi sku byin gyis rlob par byed pa'o/ /oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ni sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob par byed pa'o/ /a ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi dngos po thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi bdag nyid can
350b7(rgyud 'grel): yin pas chos kyi skur rgyas btab pa'i don du 'dir gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag du ste/ gsang sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis mi tshugs
351a1(rgyud 'grel): par byin gyis brlabs shing rgyas btab pas bdag gis don yongs su rdzogs pas na dga' ba'o/ /gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs pas na mgu ba'o/ /de ltar na rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po gsang ba'i bdag po lag
351a2(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje rnams dang bcas las bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol ba ste/ mgon po bdag cag yi rang ngo/ /legs so legs so legs par gsungs/ /rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi/ /
351a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni/ /bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad ces bya ba ste/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par mdzad pa'o/ /gang gi phyir zhe na/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa/ /'di
351a4(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam/ /zab cing yangs la rgya che ste/ /don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes bya ste/ de bas na nges pa kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'o/ /don 'di la ni sangs rgyas
351a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid tshad mar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad ces smos pa yin no/ /mtshan mchog shin tu mdzes par brgyan pa'i skur ldan zhing/ /nam mkha' i ngos
351a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar yangs pa'i grags phreng kun tu khyab/ /dge ba'i dri tshogs rgyas pas ma lus sad mdzad cing/ /ngan pa'i rab rib tshogs dang las kyi dra ba 'joms/ /bdag sogs rmongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rab rib spong byed pa'i/ /
351a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs bdag bral de bzhin nyid/ /de nyid de las mi 'gyur ming las mtshan rnams su/ /yang dag brjod sgrar mkhyen nas smra mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ /mtshan rnams yang dag brjod de yon tan
351b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis phyug /mnyam nyid mtshan 'dir 'bad de tshul bzhin rnam grol nas/ /'gro kun rjes su brtse phyir bdag gis byas pa yi/ /'grel 'dir rmongs pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus 'joms byed yin/ /sngags don rig pas rab
351b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal dgrol bar bya min gyi/ /mkhas pas lung gi snying po skyon med don brtags la/ /yang dag tshul sgo du mas mi 'gal rtogs byas na/ /ma lus don gyis brgyan cing legs par rtogs pas dgrol/ /'di byas bdag gis bsod nams
351b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba ltar dkar ba/ /mkhas ltar mthar med mthar thug yang dag gang thob pa'i/ /bsod nams tshogs des 'jig rten 'di dag ma lus pa/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid thob pa'i bde la reg gyur cig /de bzhin 'jam dpal
351b4(rgyud 'grel): grags ba ces 'jig rten 'di kun yon tan gyis brgyan cing/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog gyur shes rab ye shes mchog gi lus dang ldan/ /las kyis 'ching ba rnams las rab grol snying rje chen po rnam 'phro zhing/ /
351b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bar skyo med sems kyis gzhan don byed la rtag tu 'jug /bdud dang mu stegs las rgyal bde gshegs sras mchog 'jam dbyangs nyid gyur cig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
351b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal grags pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgyal sras dam pa mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /yon tan phul byung mtshan gyi khyad
351b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'di/ /kun la grags kyang ji bzhin don ma khrol/ /yang dag don la nor pa'i dri mas bslad/ /don 'di gzigs pas rje rgyal bla ma yis/ /gzhan la phan bzhed bka' yis bskul bas na/ /rgya chen sgra don
352a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag blos ma rtogs kyang/ /bka' mnyan mos blo gtso bor byas pas bsgyur/ /legs bkrol rgya chen don la rmongs gyur pas/ /log par bsgyur
352a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs tshul min bgyis pa 'chags/ /sgra dang don mkhas nus ldan byung 'gyur na/ /tshig don brtags la nor pa bcos par gsol/ /chos don gnyer zhing mtshan mchog rgyas
352a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pas/ /dam pa'i zhing 'dir dge ba gang bskrun des/ /'gro kun mtshan rtogs blo yi skyon bral zhing/ /bdag kyang blo mchog 'jam dbyangs mtshungs par shog/ //
352a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsarya sh+rad+d+hA ka ra warma dang/ ka ma la gupta dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// sarba mang+ga laM //
